channel.title: FrugooScape 2012
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/3094j13.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gOCWQ09UzBM[/youtube] IF YOU want to join the forums, pm me and i'll give you the link! (smf 2.0. forums)
FrugooScape 2012 is a re-make of the ever popular Frugooscape. As their were many versions of FS (FSC, FSU, FSB, FSE) I've decided to get features from them all and add them all into one big server, thus creating FrugooScape 2012!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [B][U]Combat[/U][/B] (Melee, Range, Magic)
[ul][*][COLOR=green]PvP fully complete[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]PvN fully complete[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Perfect max hit formulas[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][B][U]All Skills[/U][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=yellow]Cooking[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=yellow]Crafting[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Firemaking[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Fishing[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Mining[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Prayer[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Runecrafting[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Smithing[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Woodcutting[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [B][U]Miscellaneous[/U][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=yellow]Multiple world support[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Skill interfaces[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Level up interfaces[/COLOR][/ul]
:penguin:[B][U]Commands[/U][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=green]:: pickup[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]:: ranarmor[/COLOR][/ul]
[/CENTER]

item.title: FrugooScape 2012
item.dc:creator: @_zip _zip
item.description:
@_zip wrote:

Haha it was fun

and to the guy above me, just go to the toplist, you’ll find plenty of the crappy non-unique servers i’m sure youve put your server amongst them once or twice before.

What more do you want from a spawnable server with no item requirements? :L

item.title: FrugooScape 2012
item.dc:creator: @_zip _zip
item.description:
@_zip wrote:

Its frugoo…

tHE SKills were terrible, the combat sucked and it was glitched up to fuck.

This will be 1000x better, just the same features.
I’ve supplied how the skills are going, I’ve told you how to the combat is, and how the commands are.

What more do you want from a spawnable server with no item requirements? :L

Read full topic

[CENTER]

IF YOU want to join the forums, pm me and i’ll give you the link! (smf 2.0. forums)

FrugooScape 2012 is a re-make of the ever popular Frugooscape.
As their were many versions of FS (FSC, FSU, FSB, FSE)
I’ve decided to get features from them all and add them all into one big server, thus creating FrugooScape 2012!

Combat (Melee, Range, Magic)

[][COLOR=green]PvN fully complete[/COLOR]
